sentences.en: Concord inaugurated a new era in airplane travel.
sentences.cn: 协和飞机开创了空中旅行的新纪元.

sentences.en: CROSSFEED, An interconnection between fuel manifolds for fuel flow from one side of the airplane to an adjacent engine or one on the other side.
sentences.cn: 交输， 燃油支管之间的交连设备。 可使燃油从飞机一侧流向邻近的发动机或在机身另一侧的发动机。

sentences.en: He looked in that direction and saw an airplane.
sentences.cn: 他朝那个方向看,看见了一架飞机.

sentences.en: He slipped and fell on an airplane gangway as the cameras rolled.
sentences.cn: 在摄像时他不慎滑倒在飞机座位间的通道上。

sentences.en: Lifeless bodies from the airplane crash lay on the ground.
sentences.cn: 空难者的尸体躺在地上.

sentences.en: The ailerons on an airplane are hinged to the wing.
sentences.cn: 飞机的副翼是用铰链装在机翼上的.

sentences.en: The airplane cracked up in landing.
sentences.cn: 这架飞机在着陆时坠毁。

sentences.en: The airplane has a sophisticated electronic guidance system.
sentences.cn: 这架飞机有一套尖端的电子导航系统.

sentences.en: The airplane will take off at short notice.
sentences.cn: 一接到通知这架飞机就立刻起飞.

sentences.en: The children were asked to model an airplane out of balsa - wood.
sentences.cn: 孩子们被要求用轻木做模型飞机.

sentences.en: The insured value of the airplane was greater than its book value.
sentences.cn: 该飞机的投保价值高于它的实际账面价值。

sentences.en: The loudspeaker announced each airplane as it landed at the airport.
sentences.cn: 每架飞机在机场一着陆,扩音器就发出通告.

sentences.en: The modern airplane can arrow upward to 20, 000 feet.
sentences.cn: 现代的飞机能够如箭般地飞达20, 000英尺的高度.

sentences.en: The new airplane flies at twice the speed of sound.
sentences.cn: 这架新式飞机以两倍于音速的速度飞行.

sentences.en: The pilot crashed the airplane in landing.
sentences.cn: 飞机驾驶员在降落时使飞机坠毁.

sentences.en: The pilot of the airplane gunned his engine for a sharp climb.
sentences.cn: 飞行员加大油门使飞机急剧爬升.

sentences.en: These instruments measure movement, like that of a car or airplane.
sentences.cn: 这类仪器可以测量运动，像飞机和汽车的运动。

sentences.en: They arrived in Belgium by airplane .
sentences.cn: 他们乘飞机到达比利时。

sentences.en: We beamed the airplane down safely.
sentences.cn: 我们给飞机导航使它安全降落。

sentences.en: What can I do to kill time on the airplane?
sentences.cn: 在飞机上，我能做些什么消磨时间呢？

trans.tran_en: a vehicle that flies through the air and has one or more engines
